actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to make technical corrections to an Act preempting State economic regulation of motor carriers.
short_title: Intrastate Motor Carrier Transportation Technical Corrections Act of 1994

summary.text: Instrastate Motor Carrier Transportation Technical Corrections Act of 1994 - Amends Federal transportation law to declare that provisions relating to the prohibition against State regulation of price, route, or service of a motor carrier (other than a carrier affiliated with a direct air carrier) or a private motor carrier that provides for the transportation of property shall not apply to: (1) the transportation of garbage and refuse; (2) the transportation of recyclable materials; and (3) motor carriers that provide tow or wrecker services.

titles.title: Intrastate Motor Carrier Transportation Technical Corrections Act of 1994
A bill to make technical corrections to an Act preempting State economic regulation of motor carriers.
